summary: Better Housecarls aims to improve the looks and the AI of all Skyrim Housecarls
descriptionHtml:
[size=6pt]Better Housecarls[/size] [size=4pt] by SluggoV2[/size]
====================================================


3/17/2012

-Version 1.8

Added Light Foot Perk - followers will no linger trip traps
Thane/Housecarl dialogues will not show up again after initial conversations.


Things that I am working on or planning to add:

- get rid of the damn head bug / neck lines grrrrr!
- [s]followers live in current sandbox/cell when dismissed[/s] Give this mod a try...works great[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12933] Increased Follower Limit[/url]
- [s]edit/remove unwanted NPC dialog text[/s]
- [s]add light step perk[/s]


----------------------Description----------------------

-Better Looks
-Improved Health and Stamina
-Increased Speed
-Follower does not affect stealth meter
-Added Light Foot Perk
-Combat AI\'s changed (see images for stats)
-Housecarls are now Essential 
-Removed opposite gender animations
-Replaced both Male Housecarls with Females
-Removed default Armor/Clothes
-Armor and Weapons are located in the NPC\'s inventory which can be removed by player
-Included Thief\'s Bow (Hunting Bow with Glass Specs)


[size=5pt]Jess of Markarth[/size]

[IMG]http://i523.photobucket.com/albums/w357/xExDiesel/Jess02sml.png[/IMG]

[size=5pt]Lydia of Whiterun[/size]

[IMG]http://i523.photobucket.com/albums/w357/xExDiesel/Lydia01sml.png[/IMG]

[size=5pt]Deidra of Riften[/size]

[IMG]http://i523.photobucket.com/albums/w357/xExDiesel/Deidra02sml.png[/IMG]

[size=5pt]Jordis of Solitude[/size]

[IMG]http://i523.photobucket.com/albums/w357/xExDiesel/Jordis01sml-1.png[/IMG]

[size=5pt]Alyna of Windhelm[/size]

[IMG]http://i523.photobucket.com/albums/w357/xExDiesel/Alyna01sml.png[/IMG]



--------------------Compatible Mods-------------------


[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12933]Increased Follower Limit[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9504]Followers can Relax[/url]

---------------------Required Mods--------------------

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]


-----------------------Known Bugs----------------------

Discolored NPC heads (this is a Bethesda bug)


--------------------------Updates------------------------- 

3/17/2012
-Version 1.8 Removed unnecessary Thane dialogue to not show up again after initial conversations.
Added Light Foot Perk

3/14/2012
-Version 1.7 Another attempt to remedy the dark head syndrome. Also some tweaks to lessen the vanilla face make-up.

3/12/2012
-Version 1.6 Fixed Jordis\'s to not have opposite gender animations. Included the Facegeom mesh folder. 

03/08/2012
-Version 1.5 Included the FaceGenData folder, this should take care of those pesky dark heads!

03/05/2012
-Version 1.0 Released


---------------------------Credits-------------------------- 

Nexus - for being Awesome!
NMM
Bethesda - for the Elder Scrolls
Creation Kit

Mods used in images
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

author: SluggoV2
